snippet: Second seed Garbine Muguruza, gunning to add the Wimbledon crown to her French Open title, was sensationally beaten in the second round on Thursday by a Slovakian qualifier, removing one of the biggest obstacles to Serena Williams defending her ti...
lead_paragraph: Second seed Garbine Muguruza, gunning to add the Wimbledon crown to her French Open title, was sensationally beaten in the second round on Thursday by a Slovakian qualifier, removing one of the biggest obstacles to Serena Williams defending her title.

headline.print_headline: Muguruza Stunned by Qualifier, Draw Opens Up for Serena
headline.main: Muguruza Stunned by Qualifier, Draw Opens Up for Serena
